session_1.text: Thanks Ben! I switched to organic compost this year. Makes a huge difference.

session_1.speaker: Ben
session_1.text: What kind of compost do you use?

session_1.speaker: Gardener Rose
session_1.text: I make my own from kitchen scraps and yard waste. It takes about 6 months to mature.

session_1.text: Do you add anything else to the soil?

session_1.text: Yes, I also use worm castings. They're rich in nutrients and improve soil structure.
